name: air-traffic-control
description: Dead simple redux routing, the way it should work.

scripts.compile: mkdir -p build && babel --presets es2015,stage-0 -d build/ src/ && mv build/index.js build/air-traffic-control.js
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run minify
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.release: npm run rebuild && npm run compress

author: Airplane Mode Team
